title: The Music child. Parts 1 and 2
creator_credit: David Parry Productions and David Allen Parry
brief_description: Shows the possibilities that exist for eliciting language, basic communication and relationship activity with handicapped children through a special type of music therapy based on live musical improvisation. Gives a comprehensive overview of this special technique in a wide variety of situations with children at various levels of development.
